Grouped_Utterances: I think I just want to keep working on my mental health and finding ways to cope better. Maybe we can dive deeper into my feelings about my past relationships. I think there’s still a lot to unpack there.

Hey, Ellie. I’ve been alright. I drafted that message to my family, but I haven’t sent it yet. It was emotional. I felt a mix of relief and anxiety while writing it. I guess I’d want to express how much I miss them and how I’m trying to work on myself.
I think I’m just scared of their reaction. What if they don’t respond? I’ve thought about it, but I’m nervous. What if they don’t like it?
I usually feel more centered and ready to face the day.

I actually reached out to a couple of former colleagues. It felt good to reconnect, but I still haven’t found anything yet. They were supportive. One of them even offered to keep an eye out for openings. I’ve been writing a bit more. I think the backstory is finally coming together. I have, and it’s been helping. I try to do it every morning.
Yeah, I think I’m handling stress better. I’m less reactive than I used to be.
That’s true. Maybe I’ll share a chapter with a friend.
